getById.description: Gets an entry from 'users' by its primary key

create.sql: INSERT INTO users(username, email, password, avatarUrl, dateOfBirth, registrationDate, withdrawalDate, gender, hairColor, eyeColor, height, wheight, bio, address, provinceId, municipalityId, postcodeId) VALUES ($username, $email, $password, $avatarUrl, $dateOfBirth, $registrationDate, $withdrawalDate, $gender, $hairColor, $eyeColor, $height, $wheight, $bio, $address, $provinceId, $municipalityId, $postcodeId)

update.sql: UPDATE users SET username = $username, email = $email, password = $password, avatarUrl = $avatarUrl, dateOfBirth = $dateOfBirth, registrationDate = $registrationDate, withdrawalDate = $withdrawalDate, gender = $gender, hairColor = $hairColor, eyeColor = $eyeColor, height = $height, wheight = $wheight, bio = $bio, address = $address, provinceId = $provinceId, municipalityId = $municipalityId, postcodeId = $postcodeId WHERE userId = $userId
update.description: Updates an existing entry in 'users' by its primary key

delete.description: Deletes an existing entry in 'users' by its primary key
